Subjects: dialogues, Virgin and Christ; Christ, dialogue, with Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, dialogue, with Christ
_description: Dialogue between Christ and the Virgin — three quatrains

NLS18721.First Lines:
Behold womman a dolful sithÞis is þis sone þat
                    hanget here…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Myn herte ne may no lengere dreyȝeffor þi blod
                    þat rennet þe fro

Wilson,  Edward.
